long_description: Suited for hiking up hills, over meadows or through the wilderness, the Merrell Yankari shorts feature performance-oriented fabric and a comfortable fit to keep you ready for your next adventure. Lightweight, breathable polyester with Opti-Wick(TM) wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly, keeping you cool and comfortable even when you start to sweat. Integrated UPF 50+ sun protection continuously guards against harmful ultraviolet rays. Front slash pockets, rear patch pockets, a coin pocket and 2 cargo pockets provide ample storage space so you can keep essentials within easy reach. Closeout.
short_description: Suited for hiking up hills, over meadows or through the wilderness, the Merrell Yankari shorts feature performance-oriented fabric and a comfortable fit to keep you ready for your next adventure.
